desc1: Tough Nut is our unique hazelnut liquor crafted from authentic high-proof Moonshine spirit fused with the flavour of hazelnuts, smooth caramel and velvety nougat complemented by a dash of barrel-aged whiskey.
desc2: Our Very Cherry Moonshine tastes like freshly picked cherries from the garden and has an unmistakable taste; enjoy on the rocks or as part of a cocktail.You can find cocktail recipes on our cocktail page.
